titles.title: A bill to provide technical corrections to the Act incorporating the Naval Sea Cadet Corps.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 12/16/1987--Introduced. Provides that upon the dissolution or liquidation of the Naval Sea Cadet Corps its assets shall be distributed: (1) for tax exempt purposes; or (2) to the Federal Government, or a State or local government, exclusively for public purposes.
